metadata.title: CVE-2020-25863 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.6, 3.0.0 to 3.0.13, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.20, the MIME Multipart dissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-multipart.c by correcting the deallocation of invalid MIME parts.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-1').
